channel.title: DialogueHandler.java [rep++]
channel.description:
how can i make my npc speak with dialog??
[b]the npc i using is 724 ( this is one off the slayer tasks one how would i know what case i put at the start??[/b]
case 13: sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "My name is milli_rehnison would you like to start lost_city quest?.", "you have already completed this quest.", "to start this quest you need to speak too captain_undak he is located at mage_bank", c.talkingNpc, "milli_rehnison"); c.nextChat = 14;
[b]see the you have already completed this quest i would like that to come up if they have done it[/b]

item.title: DialogueHandler.java [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Hard_Pk Hard Pk
item.description:
@Hard_Pk wrote:

case 724: sendNpcChat4("Hello!", "My name is milli_rehnison would you like to start lost_city quest?.", "you have already completed this quest.", "to start this quest you need to speak too captain_undak he is located at mage_bank", c.talkingNpc, "milli_rehnison"); c.nextChat = 14;
dont forget to add break; at the end.

Read full topic

item.title: DialogueHandler.java [rep++]
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:
@liamp wrote:

how can i make my npc speak with dialog??

the npc i using is 724 ( this is one off the slayer tasks one how would i know what case i put at the start??

case 13:
sendNpcChat4(“Hello!”, “My name is milli_rehnison would you like to start lost_city quest?.”, “you have already completed this quest.”,
“to start this quest you need to speak too captain_undak he is located at mage_bank”, c.talkingNpc, “milli_rehnison”);
c.nextChat = 14;

see the you have already completed this quest i would like that to come up if they have done it

Read full topic
